general.financeIsFun: Finance is more fun with us
general.homeSubTitle: is designed to allow startups, medium or large companies to easily manage their finances and focus on their main activities.
general.crucialMoment: In a crucial moment of your business activities
general.allowBenefit: will allow you to benefit from optimal and comprehensive functionalities to manage your finances and focus on what matters
general.paymentEasy: Make your transactions easy by opting for online payment. The amounts received are directly transferred to your bank accounts .
general.saveTime: Save time by automating your billing process. these automated tasks will save you a lot of time
general.keepCategorize: Keep & categorize all transactions. Manage chart of accounts. See and export all accounting reports
general.attractiveDashboard: An attractive dashboard and easy-to-use features!
general.useCharts: We use charts that will allow you to quickly understand the evolution of your activity.
general.trackNumber: Track the number of sales and invoices issued
general.getOverview: Get an overview of your bank accounts balance and profits.
general.trackFin: Track the latest financial activities performed.
general.completesFeatures: Find full and completes features with attractive designs with us.

general.popularBankAccounting: Connect popular bank accounts like Stripe or PayPal
general.popularBank: Make easy your transactions by connecting with popular banks like Stripe and PayPal to receive payments directly from your customers online

general.ecoAbout: Our company is concerned about ecological issues. We invest and participate in actions that will allow the planet to continue being a pleasant place to live.
general.fewCompanies: We are one of the few companies that allow you to manage your financial activities at a reasonable cost.
general.choosePlan: Choose a plan that fit your business perfectly. Manage your business with your company, regardless of the constraints.

general.manageChartAccounting: Manage chart of accounts. Categorize all the transactions. Create assets

general.sizeBusinesses: is designed to allow small and medium sized businesses to focus on their core business while saving time and money.

admin.li4: Full access to expenses and bills

superUser.li4: Full access to expenses and bills

user.li4: Full access to expenses and bills
